vibes.name: Laid-back

upbringings.name: Middle Class

upbringings.name: Orphan

upbringings.description: Taken in by a loving family, may wonder about origins

upbringings.description: Moved frequently, learned discipline and adaptability

upbringings.description: Country upbringing with close ties to nature and hard work

upbringings.name: City Streets
upbringings.description: Grew up in the urban jungle, street-smart and worldly

upbringings.name: Nomadic/Traveling
upbringings.description: Never stayed in one place, seen much of the world

upbringings.name: Religious Household
upbringings.description: Raised with strong faith and traditional values

upbringings.name: Artistic Family
upbringings.description: Surrounded by creativity and encouraged to express themselves

upbringings.name: Academic Family
upbringings.description: Intellectuals who valued education above all

upbringings.name: Criminal Background

upbringings.name: Isolated/Sheltered

upbringings.name: Apprenticed Young

lifeEvents.description: Death of someone close shaped their worldview

lifeEvents.name: Great Betrayal

lifeEvents.description: Someone rescued them, creating a debt or bond

lifeEvents.name: Accident/Injury
lifeEvents.description: A physical or emotional trauma left lasting marks

lifeEvents.description: Found out something that changed everything

lifeEvents.name: Great Achievement
lifeEvents.description: Accomplished something remarkable that defined them

lifeEvents.name: Devastating Failure
lifeEvents.description: A major setback that taught hard lessons

lifeEvents.name: Life-Changing Journey
lifeEvents.description: A trip or adventure that transformed them

lifeEvents.name: Met a Mentor
lifeEvents.description: Someone wise guided them when they needed it most

lifeEvents.name: Lost Love
lifeEvents.description: A relationship that ended badly or tragically

lifeEvents.name: Committed/Witnessed Crime
lifeEvents.description: Involved in something that haunts them

lifeEvents.name: Saved Others
lifeEvents.description: Became a hero in a crisis moment

lifeEvents.name: Exile/Banishment

lifeEvents.name: Unexpected Inheritance
lifeEvents.description: Received something that changed their life path

lifeEvents.name: Serious Illness
lifeEvents.description: Faced mortality and came out changed

lifeEvents.name: Fierce Rivalry
lifeEvents.description: A competitor who pushed them to their limits

motivations.description: Trying to make up for past mistakes

motivations.name: Protection
motivations.description: Keeping someone or something safe at all costs

motivations.name: Discovery
motivations.description: Driven to uncover truth, knowledge, or secrets

motivations.name: Belonging
motivations.description: Searching for a place to call home

motivations.name: Freedom
motivations.description: Breaking chains and living on their own terms

motivations.name: Love
motivations.description: Driven by romantic or familial love

motivations.name: Duty
motivations.description: Bound by obligation, honor, or promises

motivations.name: Survival
motivations.description: Just trying to make it through each day

motivations.name: Legacy
motivations.description: Building something that will outlast them

motivations.name: Healing
motivations.description: Recovering from trauma, helping others heal

motivations.name: Adventure
motivations.description: Living for thrills and new experiences

motivations.name: Creation
motivations.description: Driven to make, build, or bring things to life

secrets.name: Hidden Identity
secrets.description: Not who they appear to be

secrets.description: Did something they can never reveal

secrets.name: Hidden Condition
secrets.description: Physical or mental issue they hide

secrets.name: Is a Betrayer
secrets.description: Working against someone who trusts them

secrets.name: Sole Survivor
secrets.description: The only one who lived, carries guilt

greetingRelationships.name: Acquaintances
greetingRelationships.description: Know each other casually, not close

greetingRelationships.name: Best Friends
greetingRelationships.description: Extremely close, know everything about each other

greetingRelationships.name: Childhood Friends
greetingRelationships.description: Known each other since young, deep bond

greetingRelationships.name: Secret Crush
greetingRelationships.description: One has feelings the other doesn't know about

greetingRelationships.name: Captor & Captive
greetingRelationships.description: One holds power over the other

greetingRelationships.name: Protector & Protected
greetingRelationships.description: One guards or cares for the other

greetingTropes.name: Fake Dating
greetingTropes.description: Pretending to date, feelings become real

greetingTropes.name: Forced Proximity
greetingTropes.description: Stuck together, can't escape each other

greetingTropes.name: Hurt/Comfort
greetingTropes.description: One injured or upset, other provides care

greetingTropes.name: Redemption Arc
greetingTropes.description: Villain or bad person seeking change

greetingTropes.name: Secret Identity
greetingTropes.description: Hidden truth about who they are

greetingEncounters.description: One saves the other from danger

greetingEncounters.description: One or both not fully sober

greetingEncounters.name: Late Night Encounter
greetingEncounters.description: Meeting when no one else is around

greetingEncounters.name: Lost & Found
greetingEncounters.description: One is lost, other helps navigate

positiveStoryBeats: A shared laugh breaks the tension
An unexpected compliment catches them off guard
Eye contact that lingers too long
An inside joke forms between them
A comfortable silence settles between them
One remembers something important about the other
A genuine smile that reaches their eyes
They open up about something personal
One goes out of their way to help
They notice small details about each other
They make each other feel seen
negativeStoryBeats: An awkward silence stretches between them
A secret threatens to come out
They're interrupted at the worst moment
Pride prevents either from backing down
Fear of rejection holds them back
One is distracted by other concerns
A reminder of why they drifted apart
One is more invested than the other
They bring out each other's worst
An accusation hangs in the air

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Story Continuation
canonPremiseIdeas.description: Continue from where the first greeting left off, expanding on established events
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: The interaction picks up shortly after their first meeting, with established rapport.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Different Circumstances
canonPremiseIdeas.description: Meeting under different circumstances within their established world
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: An unexpected situation in their world brings them together in a new way.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Mission or Quest
canonPremiseIdeas.description: An important mission or quest brings them together
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: A shared goal or duty forces them to work together toward a common objective.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Celebration or Festival
canonPremiseIdeas.description: A celebration or festival in their setting creates the meeting
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: A festive event in their world provides the backdrop for this encounter.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: World Crisis
canonPremiseIdeas.description: A crisis threatens their world and brings them together
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: Danger or disaster creates urgency, forcing unlikely allies together.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Significant Location
canonPremiseIdeas.description: Exploring a location mentioned in their backstory
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: A place significant to the character's past becomes the setting for this meeting.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Facing the Past
canonPremiseIdeas.description: A confrontation with their past that involves the user
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: Ghosts from the character's history resurface, and the user is present for it.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Training Together
canonPremiseIdeas.description: Training or practicing their skills together
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: A session of skill development or sparring brings them into close contact.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Political Obligation
canonPremiseIdeas.description: A political or social obligation forces interaction
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: Duty or social expectations require them to interact formally.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Recovery
canonPremiseIdeas.description: Recovering from a recent battle or hardship
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: In the aftermath of difficulty, a moment of vulnerability brings them together.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Secret Revealed
canonPremiseIdeas.description: The user discovers one of the character's secrets
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: A hidden truth about the character comes to light, changing everything.

canonPremiseIdeas.name: Power Shift
canonPremiseIdeas.description: A change in status or power dynamics affects their relationship
canonPremiseIdeas.setup: Circumstances have shifted who holds authority in their dynamic.

canonConflicts.name: Enemies Approach
canonConflicts.description: A known enemy from the character's world draws near

canonConflicts.name: Betrayal Revealed
canonConflicts.description: Someone they trusted has been working against them

canonConflicts.name: Moral Dilemma
canonConflicts.description: They face a choice that tests their values

canonConflicts.name: Scarce Resources
canonConflicts.description: They must compete or cooperate for something limited

canonConflicts.name: Time Running Out
canonConflicts.description: A deadline or timer creates urgency

canonConflicts.name: Identity Questioned
canonConflicts.description: Who they are or their loyalties are called into question

canonConflicts.name: Past Returns
canonConflicts.description: Something from their history comes back to haunt them

canonConflicts.name: Corruption Temptation
canonConflicts.description: Power or an easier path tempts them astray

canonConflicts.name: Sacrifice Required
canonConflicts.description: Something precious must be given up

canonConflicts.name: Trust Tested
canonConflicts.description: Their faith in each other faces a crucial test

canonTensions.name: Hidden Agenda
canonTensions.description: One party has motives they haven't revealed

canonTensions.name: Forbidden Knowledge
canonTensions.description: Information that shouldn't be shared becomes relevant

canonTensions.name: Duty vs Desire
canonTensions.description: What they must do conflicts with what they want

canonTensions.name: Prophecy or Fate
canonTensions.description: A prediction or destiny hangs over them

canonTensions.name: Social Barrier
canonTensions.description: Their positions in society create obstacles

canonTensions.name: Unfinished Business
canonTensions.description: Something from the past remains unresolved

canonTensions.name: Borrowed Time
canonTensions.description: Their time together is inherently limited

auPremiseIdeas.name: Coffee Shop Meeting
auPremiseIdeas.description: A chance encounter at a cozy café leads to conversation
auPremiseIdeas.setup: The familiar warmth of a coffee shop, the smell of fresh brews, and an unexpected meeting.

auPremiseIdeas.name: High School Reunion
auPremiseIdeas.description: Running into an old classmate years later
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Time has passed, but the recognition is instant. Old memories resurface.

auPremiseIdeas.name: New Coworkers
auPremiseIdeas.description: Starting work at the same company creates daily interaction
auPremiseIdeas.setup: The professional environment masks the personal tension building between them.

auPremiseIdeas.name: New Neighbors
auPremiseIdeas.description: Moving into adjacent apartments forces proximity
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Thin walls, shared spaces, and unavoidable encounters in the hallway.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Dating App Match
auPremiseIdeas.description: An online match leads to a real meeting
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Profiles and messages gave hints, but meeting in person is different.

auPremiseIdeas.name: College Life
auPremiseIdeas.description: College roommates or classmates thrown together
auPremiseIdeas.setup: The chaos of academic life creates unexpected bonds and tensions.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Friend's Party
auPremiseIdeas.description: A mutual friend's gathering introduces them
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Surrounded by people, but somehow they keep gravitating toward each other.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Customer Service
auPremiseIdeas.description: One serves, one is served, lines blur
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Professional courtesy masks growing personal interest.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Stranded Together
auPremiseIdeas.setup: No escape, no distractions, just each other and time to fill.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Wedding Guests
auPremiseIdeas.description: Attending the same wedding creates romantic atmosphere
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Love is in the air, alcohol flows freely, and inhibitions lower.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Gym Regulars
auPremiseIdeas.description: Same workout schedule leads to familiarity
auPremiseIdeas.setup: Shared routines, stolen glances, and finally a conversation.

auPremiseIdeas.name: Book Club
auPremiseIdeas.setup: What starts as discussing characters becomes discussing themselves.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Tension Finally Breaks
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Built-up tension from arguments or proximity finally snaps
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: The air has been electric between them for too long. Something has to give.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Finally Alone
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: The first time with true privacy and no interruptions
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: No witnesses, no expectations, just the two of them and what they've been avoiding.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: After the Confession
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Words have been spoken, feelings admitted, now what?
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: The truth is out. Hearts are racing. The next move will change everything.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Reunion
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Meeting again after time apart intensifies everything
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Distance made the heart grow fonder. Now distance is gone.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Game Gone Too Far
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: What started as a game or dare crosses lines
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: It was supposed to be innocent fun. It's not innocent anymore.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Comfort in Vulnerability
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Emotional openness leads to physical closeness
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Tears have been shed, walls have come down, and comfort takes a new form.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: The Morning After
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Waking up together, dealing with what happened
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Sunlight through curtains, tangled sheets, and the question: what now?

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Late Night Visit
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: An unexpected knock at the door after midnight
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Sleep was impossible anyway. This visit makes it official.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Caught in the Rain
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Seeking shelter leads to seeking warmth
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Wet clothes, shared body heat, and the sound of rain on windows.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Forbidden Desire
nsfwPremiseIdeas.description: Acting on feelings they shouldn't have
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: They know this is wrong. They don't care anymore.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Dream Becomes Reality
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: They've imagined this so many times. Reality is better.

nsfwPremiseIdeas.name: Jealousy-Fueled
nsfwPremiseIdeas.setup: Seeing them with someone else was unbearable. Time to claim what's theirs.
